        public InputNeuron getInputNeuron(int id)
                           throws CoreNetException
        Getting input neuron for specific id. The id is in the range 0 to maxNeurons -1
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the input neuron
        Returns:
        Input neuron with this id
        Throws:
        CoreNetException - Index out of bounds
